mapper.select: SELECT resour_faci_id AS facilityId, facility_nm AS facilityNm, facility_loc AS facilityLoc, facility_scale AS facilityScale, facility_cost AS facilityCost, facility_equip AS facilityEquip, facility_img AS facilityImg, facility_st_cd AS facilitySt, facility_mng_dept_cd AS facilityMngDeptCd, facility_func_cd AS facilityFuncCd FROM tb_facility WHERE 1=1 AND resour_faci_id = #{facilityId}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM tb_facility WHERE 1=1
AND facility_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR facility_loc LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR facility_scale LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR facility_equip LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND facility_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND facility_loc LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')

SELECT resour_faci_id AS resourceId, resource_nm AS resourceNm, resource_img AS resourceImg, resource_mng_dept_cd AS resourceMngDeptCd, resource_st_cd As resourceSt FROM tb_resource WHERE 1=1 AND resour_faci_id = #{resourceId}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM tb_resource WHERE 1=1
AND resource_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND resource_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')

SELECT a.appli_no AS appliNo, a.resour_faci_id AS resourFaciId, a.member_id AS memberId, a.resour_faci_divi_cd AS resourFaciDiviCd, b.facility_nm as facilityNm, a.comp_nm AS compNm, a.use_fr_dt as useFrDt, a.use_fr_tm as useFrTm, a.use_to_dt as useToDt, a.use_to_tm as useToTm, a.applic_st_cd as applicStCd, a.use_pers_num as usePersNum, a.comp_tel_no as compTelNo, a.comp_mail as compMail, a.comp_appl_nm as compApplNm, a.use_obj as useObj, a.comp_addr1 as compAddr1, a.comp_addr2 as compAddr2 FROM tb_resour_faci_applicate a INNER JOIN tb_facility b ON a.resour_faci_id = b.resour_faci_id AND a.resour_faci_divi_cd = 'F' WHERE 1=1
AND (b.facility_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR a.comp_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%'))
AND b.facility_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND a.comp_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND ((use_to_dt >= replace(#{searchFromDate},'-','') AND use_to_dt <= replace(#{searchToDate},'-','')) OR (use_fr_dt >= replace(#{searchFromDate},'-','') AND use_fr_dt <= replace(#{searchToDate},'-','')) OR (use_fr_dt <= replace(#{searchFromDate},'-','') AND use_to_dt >= replace(#{searchToDate},'-','')))
ORDER BY a.appli_no DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
